changelog.release_notes:
* More Customization Options for to turn the Ticks/Hash lines and Date off
* Hand render tuning
* Stability Updates

* Power saving options added.  Saver Mode turns off all additional features and turns on a minimal mode face to conserve battery life.  

You can specify to turn on Minimal Mode: 
  - when your battery reaches a percentage you specify
  - during certain start/end times through the day that you specify.  Want the watch to save battery life while you're sleeping?  Specify when to start and end and the face will do that for you.

* FULL color customization options!  Have it your way.  You want a pink face with red ticks and yellow hands? You can do that!
* Stability Improvements

New Features:

* New Themes (more customization options on the way)
* Bluetooth / Hourly vibrate options
* Show or Hide the Left and/or Right Complication
* Pick whatever timezone you want and Label the complications whatever you want

* Added the ability to hide the left and right time circles
* Bug Fixes
* Improved Stability

* Bug fixes
* Updated to allow Seconds hand to be turned on or off.  Turning seconds off will increase watchface efficiency and extend battery life.

data.description:
A face for those that bravely travel effortlessly across the globe - nomads, vagabonds, wanderers...

Or for those that are just bored and are curious what time it is on the other side of the planet..

Either way, Globetrot allows you to view your current time as well as select 2 other times from other parts of the world.  Select from a list of popular cities or just specify your own timezone and label - set it up as YOU like!


Other Features:

* FULL Color Customization Options

* Don't want to use the complications, turn them off and have a simple analog face.

* Bluetooth / Hourly vibrate options 

* Turn Date on or off

* Turn Ticks/Hash marks on or off

* Customize Complications - Pick and label whatever timezone you want 

* Power saver options to enable a minimal mode during times you specify or at a certain battery level

As always, please heart if you like this watchface!
